Class CookieServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.developersboard.backend.service.security.impl.CookieServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CookieService
@Service public class CookieServiceImpl extends Object implements CookieService
This is the implementation of the cookie service.

1.0
